item.title: Sublime Text 3, adding a custom python 3 build
item.description: Typing ‘python’ at the command line of my Linux Mint 18 install gives me a python 2.7 prompt. So when I run a python script in Sublime Text, it was built using Python 2.7. But I want to use python 3! So I entered a custom python 3 build. I use Linux Mint 18. The “shell_cmd” mentioned below will be different for Windows and maybe for Mac OS as well.
